definition: to bask in the light/fig. to benefit from association with sb or sth/reflected glory
variant of 沾[zhan1]/to moisten
to moisten/to be infected by/to receive benefit or advantage through a contact/to touch
light/ray/CL:道[dao4]/bright/only/merely/to use up

sentences.english: If there is a double-dip, Obama is almost certainly toast.
sentences.chinese: 如果可以两头沾光，奥巴马将毫无疑问炙手可热。
在这一点你是两面沾光。

sentences.english: Some smaller cities are stealing the glory.
sentences.chinese: 有些小一些的城市在沾光。

definition: lit. poultry and dogs rise to Heaven (idiom)/fig. to ride on sb else's success/Once one man gets a government position, all his cronies get in too/Once sb has cracked the problem, every Tom, Dick and Harry can do it
lit. to eat delicious food and drink hard liquor (idiom)/fig. to live well
lit. the divine steed Feihuang gallops (idiom)/fig. to achieve meteoric success in one's career
to live comfortably/happy and prosperous life
splendor shines on the family's door (idiom)/fig. to bring honor to one's family
to comply in order to please others/to accommodate sb else's taste/to make fun of
to bring honor to one's ancestors
to help/to assist financially
to be promoted and gain wealth (idiom)
to fawn on/to curry favor with/to make up to

lit. when a man achieves the Dao, his poultry and dogs rise to Heaven (idiom)/fig. to ride on sb else's success/Once one man gets a government position, all his cronies get in too/Once sb has cracked the problem, every Tom, Dick and Harry can do it
pinyin: yi1 ren2 de2 dao4 , ji1 quan3 sheng1 tian1

definition: excuse me (i.e. let me through, please)/reflected glory/to benefit from sb else's prestige
to get promoted
to yield interest, profit etc/to exhale (Buddhism)
future prospects/profit/to mature/to grow up
the tide rises, the boat floats (idiom); fig. to change with the overall trend/to develop according to the situation
